import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipes-list', templateUrl: './recipes-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipes-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipesListComponent { recipes : Recipe[] = [ new Recipe('test recipe','test','https://images.pexels.com/photos/1109197/pexels-photo-1109197.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=1260&h=750&dpr=1') ]; constructor(){ } }
